author: kfogel
msg: (log_message_receiver): Emit clearer placeholder for unconvertible data.

author: sussman
msg: * svn-handbook.texi:  poof\!  create a table of contents.

author: sussman
msg: Many new Subversion Handbook changes.  Many, many people gave me
Some of the people who gave feedback:
(Networking a repository):  remove perl script for crypt, replace
(Creating a repository):  clarify that 'myrepos' is a local path to
a repository.  Also, explain that the client uses file:/// to access
a local repo, while svnadmin uses a normal path.
(Make some working copies):  whoops, make text match the example.
(Client Cookbook):  stress the importance of running 'svn help'.
(Branches and Tags):  make example use the new 'svn switch' syntax.
add a link to kfogel's CVS book as an introduction to branching
concepts.  Move introductory paragraphs before the "branching with
svn cp" section.  Explain switched working copies.
(Basic Work Cycle):  duh, document the '!' flag in 'svn status'.
(Vendor branches):  a new simpler name for this subsection.
(Properties):  mention that property diffs are safe for 'patch' to consume.
(Revisions): new section --  document revision keyword and @ syntax.
(svn export):  mention the loss of properties.
* outline.txt:  update the outline to reflect new sections.

author: kfogel
msg: * CHANGES: Typo.  Fix it, I mean.
